review: Recently purchased this device for a second TV. It works well, but only after a long struggle until I found out that it was too far from my router. Roku tech support says its range is 20', and by swapping devices I have it on a TV about 20' from the router. My old standard ROKU works at a much greater distance. The range should have been specified in the product description.
